avalancheActivity.highlights: Freeze thaw cycles recently have made the snow pack stable in most places

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snow has melted considerably and the snow pack is considered stable in most places.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow has stabilized in most places. Small wind slabs could form in the Eastfjords in the next few days and could be present at high elevations in the northern part of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow has stabilized in most places. Small wind slabs could form in the Eastfjords in the next few days and could be present at high elevations in the northern part of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Áfram austlægar áttir og tíðindalítið veður. Hlýnar með lítilsháttar rigningu á þriðjudag. Bætir í úromu á miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has melted or settled in most places and is considered generally stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It rained at high elevations in the beginning of the week and snow melted in many places. Small slabs could be present at high elevations on N-NE aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow has stabilized in most places. Small wind slabs could form in the Eastfjords in the next few days and could be present at high elevations in the northern part of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow has stabilized in most places. Small wind slabs could form in the Eastfjords in the next few days and could be present at high elevations in the northern part of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austlægar áttir næstu daga og úrkomulítið. Hlýnandi á þriðjudag og miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has melted or settled in most places and is considered generally stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Temperatures have been above freezing point in mountain elevation and froze again and the snow is considered stable and hard in most places.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow has stabilized in most places. Small wind slabs could form in the Eastfjords in the next few days and could be present at high elevations in the northern part of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow has stabilized in most places. Small wind slabs could form in the Eastfjords in the next few days and could be present at high elevations in the northern part of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Tíðindalítið veður og breytilegur vindur næstu þrjá daga. Hlýnandi og nokkrar úrkoma líklega fallur sem snjór í efstu fjöllum á miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Isolated wind slabs in westerly aspects, elsewhere firn. Becoming warmer with rain on Wednesday with increased chance of wet snow avalanche problems.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Isolated wind slabs have formed in westerly aspects after snowshowers in easterly wind. Freeze-thaw cycles have made the old snow isothermal and it is considered stable in most places. Warming temperatures and rain forecasted on Wednesday that increases the chance of wet snow avalanche problems. Stability expected to increase on Thursday with colder temperatures.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow has stabilized in most places. Small wind slabs could form in the Eastfjords in the next few days and could be present at high elevations in the northern part of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow has stabilized in most places. Small wind slabs could form in the Eastfjords in the next few days and could be present at high elevations in the northern part of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austlægar áttir og hlýnandi veður með rigningu hátt til fjalla á þriðjudag og miðvikudag hlýnar þegar líður á. Hægt kólnandi á fimmtudag og einhver él.
